name: Street Food Walk in Chandni Chowk
description: Guided walk through Delhi's oldest market sampling paranthe, jalebi, and chaat from legendary stalls.

name: Airport Lounge Access (Plaza Premium)
description: Premium lounge with buffet, shower, Wi-Fi, and recliner seats. Perfect for long layovers.

name: Qutub Minar Visit
description: UNESCO World Heritage Site — the tallest brick minaret in the world, dating back to 1193 AD.

name: Café Hopping in Hauz Khas Village
description: Explore quirky cafés, art galleries, and boutique shops in one of Delhi's most vibrant neighbourhoods.

name: Metro Ride to Connaught Place
description: Quick metro trip to CP — browse Janpath market, grab Keventers milkshake, and people-watch.

name: Spa Session at Hotel
description: Full-body Swedish massage at a 5-star hotel spa. Ideal for de-stressing during a long trip.

name: National Museum Tour
description: India's largest museum with 200,000+ artefacts spanning 5,000 years of Indian civilisation.

name: Chai at a Railway Platform Stall
description: Classic kulhad chai from a railway platform vendor. Costs almost nothing, tastes like nostalgia.

name: Lodhi Garden Morning Walk
description: Serene walk through Mughal-era tombs and manicured gardens. Popular with joggers and bird-watchers.

name: Local Cooking Class
description: Learn to cook butter chicken and naan from scratch with a local home chef in old Delhi.

name: Rickshaw Ride through Old Delhi
description: Bumpy, thrilling cycle-rickshaw ride through the narrow lanes of Shahjahanabad.

name: Co-working Space Day Pass
description: Day pass at a modern co-working space with high-speed WiFi, coffee bar, and meeting rooms.
